1370: Herman was born in Op 't Speuy in 1370.
Got married to Sybillia at age 18 in 1370.
Had a son with Sybillia, Laurens, at age 18.
1371: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Riet, at age 19.
1376: Had a son with Sybillia, Hugheman, at age 24.
1377: Had a son with Sybillia, Moys, at age 25.
1378: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Nannen, at age 26.
1379: Had a son with Sybillia, Trove, at age 27.
1381: Had a son with Sybillia, Bertoldus, at age 29.
Lost son Moys when Moys was 5 years old.
1385: Had a son with Sybillia, Sygerus, at age 33.
1386: Had a son with Sybillia, Maelkin, at age 34.
1388: Lost son Suam when Suam was 0 years old.
Sybillia gave birth to their stillborn son Suam in 1388.
1392: Lost son Maelkin when Maelkin was 7 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1393: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Hildegardis, at age 41.
